actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend from February 1, 1976, to October 1, 1977, the period during which payment may be made for certain child day care services under titles IV and XX of the Social Security Act without regard to certain new staffing standards imposed by or under such title XX.

summary.text: Extends from February 1, 1976, to October 1, 1977, the period during which payment may be made for child day care services under titles IV (Aid to Dependent Children) and XX (Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act without regard to new staffing standards imposed by or under title XX.

titles.title: A bill to extend from February 1, 1976, to October 1, 1977, the period during which payment may be made for certain child day care services under titles IV and XX of the Social Security Act without regard to certain new staffing standards imposed by or under such title XX.
